Package ie.mtu.application.student.view

Class ViewRecordGUI

java.lang.Object
ie.mtu.application.student.view.TemplateGUI
ie.mtu.application.student.view.ViewRecordGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, IGUI
public class ViewRecordGUI
extends TemplateGUI
implements Observer, IGUI
Class that will display student information and their grades, user will have to select in a combobox a student to show his information
